com.hybris.cis.client.rest.tax

Interface TaxClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CisClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaxClientImpl, TaxMockClientImpl

    public interface TaxClient
extends CisClient
    Client interface for a TaxService.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <any> adjust(java.lang.String xClientRef, java.net.URI documentLocation, CisOrder order)
      Adjusts a previously submitted or invoiced tax document.
      <any> cancel(java.lang.String xClientRef, java.net.URI documentLocation)
      Cancels a previously submitted or invoiced tax document.
      <any> exists(java.lang.String xClientRef, java.net.URI documentLocation)
      Checks if a tax document exists.
      <any> invoice(java.lang.String xClientRef, CisOrder order)
      Creates an invoice based on the provided order details.
      <any> post(java.lang.String xClientRef, CisOrder order)
      Submits taxes for the given order.
      <any> quote(java.lang.String xClientRef, CisOrder order)
      Returns a tax quote for the order.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hybris.cis.client.rest.common.CisClient

        ping

    • Method Detail

      • quote

        <any> quote(java.lang.String xClientRef,
            CisOrder order)
        Returns a tax quote for the order.
        Parameters:
        xClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        order - The order details to get the quote for
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • post

        <any> post(java.lang.String xClientRef,
           CisOrder order)

        Submits taxes for the given order.

        Taxes can be posted when the order is placed, which will create a persisted tax document for later reference.

        Parameters:
        xClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        order - The order details to post taxes for
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • invoice

        <any> invoice(java.lang.String xClientRef,
              CisOrder order)

        Creates an invoice based on the provided order details.

        Invoiced orders can be adjusted or cancelled.

        Parameters:
        xClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        order - The order details to invoice taxes for
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • cancel

        <any> cancel(java.lang.String xClientRef,
             java.net.URI documentLocation)

        Cancels a previously submitted or invoiced tax document.

        Parameters:
        xClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        documentLocation - The location URI of the document (can be relative or absolute)
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • adjust

        <any> adjust(java.lang.String xClientRef,
             java.net.URI documentLocation,
             CisOrder order)

        Adjusts a previously submitted or invoiced tax document.

        Parameters:
        xClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        documentLocation - The location URI of the document to adjust
        order - CisOrder with lineitems to be cancelled
        Returns:
        A tax document

      • exists

        <any> exists(java.lang.String xClientRef,
             java.net.URI documentLocation)

        Checks if a tax document exists.

        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        xClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        documentLocation - The location URI of the document (can be relative or absolute)
        Returns:
        a rest response
